name: Z-1 Assault
description:
the Z-1 Assault is a balanced and 'powerful' assault rifle suitable for short and medium range engagements produced by <info>Z-Arm Tech</info>.
the Z-1 Assault uses <info>small caliber</info> ammunition, it is modeled after the M4 (most likely the Colt Commando variation) with a futuristic design. It has the word 'Z-1' right in front of its trigger. It has scratches and some duct tape wrapped over its stock, carry handle, grip and handguard, which proves this gun has been well used and is now in bad condition but still somewhat usable.

This weapon is <bad>poorly made</bad> and will <bad>easily malfunction</bad> and will <bad>not handle much if any beating</bad>

name: HVM Advertisement paper
description:
'High Value Metrics is proud to present it's latest HVM weapons line!' 
a broad number of images of weapons are placed across the flier, 
a picture of a pistol named HVM 001, 
a frail looking SMG named HVM 002, 
a sturdy but clunky assault rifle named HVM 005 G-Class, 
a very heavy looking LMG called HVM 008, 
and a shotgun across the background with 'HVM 004, where nanomaterials make the impossible come reality' written under it as 25 shotgun shells are placed under it, 
all weapons have green and light brown digital pattern camo panels ontop of very dark gray internals.

description:
The CM 505 is a LMG produced by <info>critical mass</info> 
the CM 505 delivers a punishing rate of fire with incredible stopping power. A massive belt of rounds keeps it shooting harder, for longer. this weapon has a bright LED on it's side and uses a cylindrical shaped drum magazine.

This weapon is <good>good</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

name: CM 530 BabyCOM
description:
The CM 530 BabyCOMis a LMG produced by <info>critical mass</info>, 
the CM 530 BabyCOM delivers a punishing rate of fire with incredible stopping power. A massive belt of rounds keeps it shooting harder, for longer. it also uses COM (Center Of Mass) technology to increase the bullet's speed and damage. this weapon has a bright LED on it's side and uses a cylindrical shaped drum magazine.

This weapon is <good>good</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

name: Hotspot
description:
the Hotspot uses intensified <info>microwave energy</info> to destroy organic targets easily, Although the Hotspot is a laser, it still has a range. Because of this, the laser beam can terminate in midair. it's produced by <info>Rancor</info>

This weapon is <good>unique</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

name: Shredder
description:
the Shredder is a unique weapon produced by Rancor\, it features a small magazine at the bottom to load it's unique type of ammo, circular blades.

This weapon is <good>good</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

name: Poison Claw
description:
the Poison Claw is one of the only pistol designed by Rancor 
the weapon can be inspired by the look of the Vita-Saw from TF2n
it has a huge razor sharp blade under the weapon making it impossible to mount underbarrel accessories, and a small liquid tank on top covering the sights, the small liquid tank hold multiple liters of acid concentrated in an atomic shrinker enivoment, making for an effectively endless source of acid, the acid is then poured inside the bullet as you press the trigger to shoot off a bullet of concentrated acid inside of the enemy.

This weapon is <good>good</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

name: Mixmaster
description:
the Mixmaster is an assault rifle produced by Rancor 
it shoots super powered molted plasma from the air using battery power and has the unique ability to shoot two flechettes per trigger pull 
This rifle is often designated as a crowd control gun thanks to the flechette, the metal weapon build is covered in metal spikes on top of it's red metal plates placed on top of the black metal frame.

This weapon is <good>good</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

name: Hard Thorn
description:
the Hard Thorn is an assault rifle produced by Rancor 
it shoots high caliber bullets, using super speed technology to burst the bullet in multiple shreds behaving like a shotgun with the same power and range of an assault rifle. 
This rifle is often designated as a crowd control gun thanks to the high spread and range, the metal weapon build is covered in metal spikes on top of it's red metal plates placed on top of the black metal frame.
this weapon has a sharp blade with multiple spikes under it's barrel, making it impossible to attach underbarrel modifications but a very effective melee weapon.

This weapon is <good>good</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

name: Heartburn
description:
the Heartburn is an assault rifle manufactured by Rancor 
the bullets fired from this weapon are molten before exiting the muzzle using high powered molten metal glowing on the sides of the barrel, this molten iron does not provide heat outside of the weapon's build
 the metal weapon build is covered in metal spikes on top of it's red metal plates placed on top of the black metal frame, it has five razor sharp spikes under and above the barrel making it impossible to mount underbarrel modifications, also on the sides and on the front of the barrel there are bright red glowing lines and circles reminding you about it's unending molten power.

This weapon is <good>good</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

name: Stripper
description:
the Stripper is a heavy automatic shotgun manufactured by Rancor, The Stripper is lever action like the 1887 Shockfield (even though the Stripper is still fully automatic, oddly enough)
the shotgun has a bayonet like blade under the barrel, but it's small enough so that it's possible to mount an underbarrel modification.

This weapon is <good>good</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>
